Package: org.grails.datastore.mapping.simple

[Java] Class SimpleMapDatastore

      • org.grails.datastore.mapping.simple.SimpleMapDatastore

      • A simple implementation of the Datastore interface that backs onto an in-memory map. Mainly used for mocking and testing scenarios.

        Authors:
        Graeme Rocher
        Since:
        1.0

          • Inherited fields
